body_html:
@persiyanov You shouldn't need to create any new ops. Instead, you'll need to write a more functional version of the registered gradient function at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L334

It may help to look at other gradient-of-derivative registrations, such as https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L501.
body_text:
@persiyanov You shouldn't need to create any new ops.  Instead, you'll need to write a more functional version of the registered gradient function at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L334
It may help to look at other gradient-of-derivative registrations, such as https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L501.
body:
@persiyanov You shouldn't need to create any new ops.  Instead, you'll need to write a more functional version of the registered gradient function at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/nn_grad.py#L334

It may help to look at other gradient-of-derivative registrations, such as https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/math_grad.py#L501.
